a.title: Classical Education
Parents as Primary Educators

2020-2021 School Calendar,

div.br: Results from March 4, 2020 Lottery Now Available
Catch up on the latest happenings at BFCCPS >>

div.p: Our mission is to assist parents in their role as primary educators by providing students with a classical, academic education coupled with sound character development and community service. More on the BFCCPS Mission →
